channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: The Microsoft SoftCard for the Apple II: Getting two processors to share memory
item.description:
But what happens to the old 6502 processor. Another wrinkle in the way that the 6502 and Z80 shared memory is in the memory map. The solution is to remap the memory by putting address translation circuitry on the SoftCard, so that when the Z80 asks for memory address $0000, say, it actually gets physical memory $1000.

Read more

item.title: UPS plane crashes near Louisville airport
item.description:
At least seven people were killed and several others injured after a UPS plane crashed shortly after takeoff near the Louisville International Airport on Tuesday, officials said. At least 11 people were injured, officials said earlier. A fireball erupts near airport property after reports of a plane crash at the Louisville International Airport on Tuesday, Nov.

Read more

item.title: The Hackers Manifesto (The Conscience of a Hacker) (1986)
item.description:
Mine is a world that begins with school. This is our world now. My crime is that of judging people by what they say and think, not what they look like.

Read more
